title: Yuki no Niiduma wa Boku to Tokeaitai
description:
From the same author who made Renai Boukun and many others!

Yusuke Sakanoi is a young man who earns a living as a part-timer. One day he is rescued by a mysterious beauty when he was lying down due to a heat stroke. Yusuke started looking for her to return her lost hat, but when he managed to find her, she was standing in a brothel!? Her name is Ginka, she is a Yuki-Onna who came to the city in search of a husband and was going to work at the brothel, a secret feeding ground for the Yuki-Onna! In an interesting turn of events, she and Yusuke somehow become a couple...!? What is Yusuke's fate?!
A cute and sexually knowledgeable Yuki-Onna and a part-timer. This is a newlywed romantic comedy!

Indonesian
[Spoiler]Suatu hari, seorang pemuda, Sakanoi Yusuke, yang mencari nafkah sebagai pekerja paruh waktu, diselamatkan dari sengatan panas oleh kecantikan misterius.
 Sakanoi mencarinya. Dia berhasil menemukannya, tapi dia berada di soapland.
 Namanya Ginka. Dia adalah Yuki onna pemula yang datang ke kota untuk mencari roh dan suaminya di Soapland,  Soapland adalah tempat makan bagi Yuki onna!
 Entah bagaimana,dia dan Ginka bakal menikah untuk pertama kalinya ...? Bagaimana nasib Yusuke?


Ini adalah kisah tentang wanita salju yang lucu berpengetahuan luas dan pasangan semu! Komedi cinta yang sedikit nakal dan mengerikan tentang pengantin baru![/Spoiler]

matches.title: Wakamono no Kuro Mahou Hanare ga Shinkoku desu ga, Shuushoku shite Mitara Taiguu Iishi, Shachou mo Tsukaima mo Kawaikute Saikou desu!
